name: Samuro
title: The Blademaster
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 25% of Samuro's damage and have 50% of his current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time. Mirror Image will remove most negative effects from Samuro.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk. Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until Samuro attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage. While Stealthed, his Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Samuro is Unrevealable for the first second of Wind Walk.

heroics.name: Bladestorm
heroics.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Illusion Master
heroics.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the target Mirror Image. Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of Samuro's damage.
